text:
Tessian | Frontend Team Lead |London | Full Time

Tessian is a cybersecurity platform that helps world leading organisations prevent highly sensitive information being emailed to the wrong people.

Weâ€™re looking for a Frontend Team Lead to join our Engineering team. We are building an Enterprise dashboard that sits on top of our machine learning platform and allows detailed monitoring, analytics and management.

We'd love to meet someone who has leadership experience and is a great problem solver who takes pride in their work. As well as experience leading a team, you should be comfortable with Javascript, frontend framework. If you're also able to use a little Python to plug our frontend into our backend that's a plus!

Please see more details at https://jobs.lever.co/tessian/2c175a8b-773f-4df4-8e46-d70f4f...

Thanks!
